title: Harry Styles’ age and net worth as he returns with new Lights Up song and video
text:
Harry Styles dropped a new single at 5am this morning (Picture: Charles Sykes/Invision/AP)

Former One Direction star Harry Styles has released a brand new single, and boy, is it steamy!

Lights Up, his first release in two years, dropped at 5am this morning and has already racked up over 1.3 million views (and counting)!

To celebrate the return of the 1D star, we look at his life and career so far.

What is Harry Styles’ age, early life and net worth?

Harry was born on 1 February 1994, making him 25 years old.

He was born in Redditch, Worcestershire, and grew up in Cheshire, where he attended Holmes Chapel Comprehensive School.

He has since spent his time between London, New York and LA.

This summer, he purchased a second home in North London, implying he may plan to spend more time there.

His musical career started in 2010 when he auditioned for The X Factor, aged just 16.

Advertisement

Advertisement

It’s safe to say he’s no ordinary 25-year-old, which is evidenced in his whopping net worth of £58 million.

The fresh-faced 1D boys pictured in 2011 (Picture: Getty)

Harry was named the second richest ‘young musician’ in this year’s The Sunday Times Rich List, overtaken only by Ed Sheeran (worth an eye-watering £160m).

His staggering net worth comes from a range of ventures including his role in Christopher Nolan’s 2017 film Dunkirk, as well as his men’s tailoring campaign with Gucci earlier this year.

Former 1D bandmates Niall Horan, Louis Tomlinson, Liam Payne and Zayn Malik all made it to the top ten, too.

Niall is worth a reported £49 million followed by Louis who is worth £44 million.

He is closely followed by Liam whose net worth clocks in at £42 million and Zayn, worth £36 million.

‘Maybe at a show you can have a moment of knowing that you’re not alone. I’m aware that as a white male, I don’t go through the same things as a lot of the people that come to the shows.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

While he remained fairly tight-lipped about his own identity, Harry clarified his stance as an ally.

He said: ‘I can’t claim that I know what it’s like, because I don’t.’

What are Harry Styles’ upcoming music plans?

It goes without saying that Harry’s latest video has set pulses racing across the world.

Lights Up, filmed in Mexico, features a drenched and topless Harry, surrounded by sultry, scantily clad boys and girls.

Fans had been going wild with speculation earlier this month after they spotted mysterious posters emblazoned with the words: ‘DO YOU KNOW WHO YOU ARE’? This line features heavily in Lights Up, so could the build-up be related to this song, or could a new album be about to drop as well? In November 2018 he told i-D magazine he was working on his second album but has remained pretty tight lipped since. Time will tell! What has Harry Styles done since One Direction split up? Harry has worked with Gucci since 2018 (Picture: Marc Piasecki/GC Images) Following the band’s split, Harry released his first debut solo album in 2017, Sign of the Times. In September 2017 he toured with the album, performing in North and South America, Europe, Asia, and Australia. As well as his leading role in Dunkirk, he has made several TV appearances including Harry Styles at the BBC and The Late Late Show with James Cordon. He has also worked behind the camera and is an executive producer for CBS’s sitcom Happy Together. In 2018 he started working as a model for Gucci.
description: To celebrate the return of the former One Direction star we take a look at Harry Style' story so far, from his net worth to his sexuality.
